utilities module

class utilities.ANNaverage(ann_list)[source]

Bases: object

Class used as a wrapper around a list of individually-trained neural networks. Can be used to average the predictions across these individual networks to increase overall accuracy.

Methods

predict(params, *args, **kwargs)

Function to compute predictions across the elements of self.ann_list and return their average.
predict(params, *args, **kwargs)[source]

Function to compute predictions across the elements of self.ann_list and return their average.

Parameters:
paramslist

Input parameters at which to predict outputs

Returns:
mean_predictionslist

Mean predictions, taken across self.ann_list

utilities.generalized_Xp(s1x, s1y, s2x, s2y, q)[source]

Function to compute generalized effective precessing spin parameter, as defined in Gerosa+ 2021 (https://arxiv.org/abs/2011.11948)

Parameters:
s1xfloat or np.array

x-component of the primary’s spin

s1yfloat or np.array

y-component of the primary’s spin

s2xfloat or np.array

x-component of the secondary’s spin

s2yfloat or np.array

y-component of the secondary’s spin

qfloat or np.array
Returns:
Xpfloat or np.array

Generalized precessing spin parameter

utilities.load_training_data(data_directory, n_bbh=20000, n_bns=20000, n_nsbh=20000, n_bbh_certain=20000, n_bbh_hopeless=60000, n_bns_certain=20000, n_bns_hopeless=20000, n_nsbh_certain=20000, n_nsbh_hopeless=20000, n_combined_hopeless=20000, rng_key=111)[source]

Helper function to load, concatenate, and shuffle training and validation data for use in neural network training.

Parameters:
data_directorystr

Path to directory containing training data

n_bbhint

Number of true LVK BBH injections (both found and missed) to include in training set, following hopeless cut

n_bnsint

Number of true LVK BNS injections (both found and missed) to include in training set, following hopeless cut

n_nsbhint

Number of true LVK NSBH injections (both found and missed) to include in training set, following hopeless cut

n_bbh_certainint

Number of additional “certain” BBH injections to include in training set

n_bbh_hopelessint

Number of additional “hopeless” BBH injections to include in training set

n_bns_certainint

Number of additional “certain” BNS injections to include in training set

n_bns_hopelessint

Number of additional “hopeless” BNS injections to include in training set

n_nsbh_certainint

Number of additional “certain” NSBH injections to include in training set

n_nsbh_hopelessint

Number of additional “hopeless” NSBH injections to include in training set

n_combined_hopelessint

Number of additional “hopeless” auxiliary injections to include in training set

rng_keyint

Random seed for reproducibility

Returns:
train_datapd.DataFrame

Training data, concatenated and shuffled

val_datapd.DataFrame

Validation data, concatenated and shuffled
